MTG4934 - Topics in Topology and Geometr.name: MTG4934 - Topics in Topology and Geometry

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Advanced topics in geometry and topology. Selection of topics will vary.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Topology, Simplicaial Complexes, Homology and Cohomology, Poincare and Alexander Duality, Morse Functions, Reeb Graphs, Persistance, Stability and Applications

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Axioms & finite geometries, transformations groups, 2 & 3-space Euclidean motions, convexity in 2 & 3-space. Polygon & circle Euclidean geometry, constructible numbers, constructions & non-Euclidean geometry.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Metric spaces, topological spaces, limit points, continuity, compactness, and connectedness.

Course Description.title: Course Description
Course Description.text: Topics include curves and surfaces, differential manifolds, tangent space, differentials, curvature and torsion tensors, connections, covariant differentiation, lie derivative, integration on manifolds, and Riemannian manifolds.
